item.title: Martha's Vineyard Tours Private and Fun!
item.description: We love to give our customers a real experience of Martha's Vineyard we cover it all. We take time with you leaving you enough time to shop, explore and walk around the Island. Plus we’ll stop and have a harbor side picnic! You’ll snack on the freshest seafood and sip on your complimentary wine!

image.alt: Martha's Vineyard Tours Private and Fun!

item.title: Provincetown & Cape Cod High Speed Ferry to/from Boston
item.description: This 90-minute journey on a catamaran is the fastest and most luxurious way to travel to Cape Cod, where restaurants, beaches, shopping and nightlife await.

image.alt: Provincetown & Cape Cod High Speed Ferry to/from Boston

item.title: Private Guided Night Photography Tours on Cape Cod (for one photographer.)
item.description: Capture long-exposure images of Cape Cod at night by prebooking this one-on-one photography tour with an experienced photographer. Night photography is a specialized skill, and working with a full-time night photographer is a great way to improve your shooting technique. Book in advance to secure one of the limited spots available, and bring home an included matted print and night-photography course material.

image.alt: Private Guided Night Photography Tours on Cape Cod (for one photographer.)

item.title: Cape Cod & Provincetown Self-Guided Driving & Walking Audio Tour
item.description: Experience the best of Cape Cod in your own time without overlooking any sights with this self-guided driving tour. Download the app with its GPS map, audios and text, and hit the road from the Cape Cod Visitor Center. Follow the route to see and learn about the peninsula's lighthouses, beaches and sights, and take optional detours to relax, hike or delve deeper into the cape's history. For the entire year, you can dip in and out whenever you wish.

image.alt: Cape Cod & Provincetown Self-Guided Driving & Walking Audio Tour

item.title: Wine and Wine Jelly-Sauce Tasting on Plymouth Bay
item.description: Experience true local wines with a tasting at Plymouth Bay Winery, where talented vintners and chefs create wines, wine jellies and wine sauces from fruits that are native to the northeastern United States. Sample the entire collection of wines, and learn about using the jellies and sauces in your home cooking. Finish the tasting with an etched, commemorative glass from this unique winery in ‘America’s Hometown,’ just a stone’s throw away from historic Plymouth Rock.

image.alt: Wine and Wine Jelly-Sauce Tasting on Plymouth Bay

item.title: Mayflower Trolley Tour!
item.description: Tour Provincetown aboard our authentic Trolleys featuring the history of the Mayflower's first landing, the development of our famous art colony, the beauty of the National Seashore and much more. Tours available from May thru October.

image.alt: Mayflower Trolley Tour!

item.title: Kayak The Creek Nature Tour
item.description: RideAway Adventures has been awarded the best tours on Cape Cod 12 years in a row. We have the only fully ACA certified guide staff on Cape Cod. Our tours stay at low numbers so that it is a fun and unique experience for every participant. Our equipment is always top of the line and this area is perfect for all levels of kayakers.

image.alt: Kayak The Creek Nature Tour

item.title: Truro Cape Cod Lighthouse and Highland House Museum Tour
item.description: Join us for an unforgettable voyage through the Outer Cape! Our expedition will commence with a picturesque drive through the Provincelands National Seashore, where we'll marvel at three ancient lighthouses that have safely guided seafarers for generations. Next, we'll journey to the Truro Highland Lighthouse for a guided tour of the towering structure – you'll even have the opportunity to climb to its summit! This remarkable lighthouse boasts a museum and a charming gift shop, offering awe-inspiring, panoramic vistas of the Atlantic coastline. To conclude our day, we'll take a tranquil stroll to the Highland House Museum. This true hidden treasure showcases the diverse maritime, Native American, and American art history all under one roof—just a friendly reminder: the Highland House Museum reopens on June 1st. You'll have ample time to explore the National Seashore by booking before then. I'm excited to share this incredible experience with you!

image.alt: Truro Cape Cod Lighthouse and Highland House Museum Tour

item.title: Cape Cod Explorer Tour
item.description: RideAway Adventures has been awarded the best tours on Cape Cod 12 years in a row. We have the only fully ACA certified guide staff on Cape Cod. Our tours are small and intimate so that it is a fun and unique experience for every participant. Our equipment is always top of the line and this area is perfect for all levels of kayakers. RideAway Adventures is the highest rated outdoor company on Cape Cod and we are committed to creating ocean ambassadors through education and active environmental awareness.

image.alt: Cape Cod Explorer Tour

item.title: National Seashore Tour with Guided Hike
item.description: Explore the highlights of Cape Cod’s seashore, starting from Pilgrim Landing and later into the Beech Forest for a guided hike on this small-group tour. This is an intimate group, so you can ask any questions from your knowledgeable tour guide, and learn all about the area’s history as you explore together. Drive for part of the tour, and then be prepared to walk around one mile (1.6 kilometers).

image.alt: National Seashore Tour with Guided Hike

item.title: Dunn's River Falls and Ocho Rios Sightseeing with Shopping
item.description:
Visit the world-famous Dunn's River Falls where you experience the White River waterfall from the mountain cascading 1000 feet or (300 meters) down naturally terraced steps. This attraction famous for being featured in the James Bond movie Dr. No. as well as the 1988 film Cocktail featuring Tom Cruise.
This excursion gives you the opportunity to climb the world-famous Dunn's River Falls with a certified guide and enjoy some time in the majestic, warm ocean.
Enjoy scenic views of the lush vegetation of Ocho Rios while basking in its culture.
Experience the authentic islanders who are willing to share their knowledge and love of the area.
Please see the Entrance for Dunn's River excursion listed in the excluded area.

image.alt: Dunn's River Falls and Ocho Rios Sightseeing with Shopping

item.title: Cape Cod Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Upgrade your drive through scenic Cape Cod with a self-guided tour that you can conveniently download onto your phone. The audio narration plays based on your location, and you can start, stop, and skip stops whenever you like. You’re in charge of your time, unlike traditional tours, and can explore at your preferred pace.

image.alt: Cape Cod Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Cape Cod Caper Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Experience Cape Cod on a different level to most travelers with this fun-filled scavenger hunt. Part tour, part detective hunt, this immersive experience centers on a smartphone digital quest and remote host who’ll explain the rules and guide you around the cape by self-drive car. Check in at scenic destinations, interpret art, history, and culture clues; complete challenges, meet locals, and score points to compete on an international leaderboard.

image.alt: Cape Cod Caper Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Provincetown Self-Guided Walking Audio Tour
item.description: Explore Provincetown's rich history with this self-guided walking tour! Discover the charm of Commercial Street, admire the towering Pilgrim Monument, and visit the bustling Beachcombers at Town Hall. Stop by the historic Adams Pharmacy and Whalers Wharf. Take in the architecture at 2 Masonic Place and the Martin House. Experience the legacy at the former Zora's Fish Market and Railroad Wharf. Pass by the Seth Nickerson House and the home of Jack Tworkov. Conclude at the stunning Land's End Inn and Pilgrim's First Landing Park. After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route. New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!

image.alt: Provincetown Self-Guided Walking Audio Tour

item.title: Private Open-Air Pedicab Tour in Provincetown
item.description: Skip walking and sightsee while seated with a guide to provide commentary and recommendations on this private pedicab Provincetown tour. Board your open-air pedicab with your bicycle-pedaling guide and glide around the Pilgrims’ First Landing Park and Commercial Street where you’ll feel the town’s vibe in a way that’s difficult from inside a vehicle. Then, visit dune-backed Herring Cove beach before a drop-off near the Long Point shuttle—handy for continuing your sightseeing. A souvenir Polaroid photo is included.

image.alt: Private Open-Air Pedicab Tour in Provincetown

item.title: Provincetown Prowl Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Provincetown Prowl Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Cape Cod Sunset Kayak Tour
item.description: RideAway Adventures has been awarded the best tours on Cape Cod 12 years in a row. We have the only fully ACA certified guide staff on Cape Cod. Our tours stay at low numbers so that it is a fun and unique experience for every participant. Our equipment is always top of the line and this area is perfect for all levels of kayakers.

image.alt: Cape Cod Sunset Kayak Tour

item.title: Cape Cod Kayak Rentals in the Great Marsh
item.description: Discover the enchanting beauty of East Sandwich's Great Marsh! Immerse yourself in stunning wildlife, scenic vistas, and the tranquility of nature as you kayak through this picturesque sanctuary. The Sandwich Great Marsh is a must see location for paddlers on Cape Cod. Its natural scenery and beauty is unmatched. We provide top of the line equipment and have been rated the Best of Cape Cod twelve years in a row. With our rentals you can go at your own pass and take your time in this amazing location. The rentals include staging and transportation of the equipment so you never have to lift or move anything on your own. Come join RideAway, the number one adventure outfitter on Cape Cod, and see the Cape like never before.

image.alt: Cape Cod Kayak Rentals in the Great Marsh

item.title: Private Airport Transfer in Montego Bay and Falmouth Hotels
item.description: Avoid the hassle of looking for a taxi when you arrive at Montego Bay’s airport by pre-booking a private transfer service to your area hotel. Your driver will take you and your party to your final destination in a private, air-conditioned vehicle. Transfers to the airport from your hotel are also available, or you can just book a round-trip.

image.alt: Private Airport Transfer in Montego Bay and Falmouth Hotels

item.title: Massachusetts Self-Guided Driving and Walking Tours Bundle
item.description: Enjoy complete flexibility and explore the parts of Massachusetts that most interest you with this collection of self-guided walking and driving tours. Receive 10 different itineraries and choose the day and time to use any of them. Use offline with GPS and learn about each place as you travel through.

image.alt: Massachusetts Self-Guided Driving and Walking Tours Bundle

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: The Crown Jewel of Cape Cod
item.description: Explore Provincetown in a unique way with this app-led scavenger hunt. Discover hidden gems, landmarks, and local trivia as you navigate the historic district. Perfect for everyday adventures, bachelorette parties, birthdays, or corporate team building. Choose your interactive role and compete or collaborate with your team. Challenges vary for a personalized experience and there are no reservations needed.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: The Crown Jewel of Cape Cod

item.title: Cape Cod Kayak Rentals in Popponesset Bay Mashpee
item.description: Our Mashpee Popponesset Bay location is one of the top rated kayaking locations on Cape Cod. It is a combination of beautiful wildlife, amazing real estate and never ending wild life. Not to mention the private beach only accessible by boat! We provide top of the line equipment and have been rated the Best of Cape Cod twelve years in a row. With our rentals you can go at your own pass and take your time in this amazing location. The rentals include staging and transportation of the equipment so you never have to lift or move anything on your own. Come join RideAway, the number one adventure outfitter on Cape Cod, and see the Cape like never before.

image.alt: Cape Cod Kayak Rentals in Popponesset Bay Mashpee

item.title: The Local Tasting Tour - Provincetown & Truro!
item.description:
We're kicking off our adventure at the much-loved Provincetown Brewing Co. for a beer tasting and some tasty appetizers to share.
Next stop is the charming Salty Market Farmstand in Truro, where you'll find all sorts of fresh goodies! Choose from their specialty dips, chips, mouthwatering salads, and delicious sandwiches made right there. The selections might change depending on the season.
After that, we'll make our way to the Truro Vineyard for some delightful wine or spirits tasting, or if you prefer, you can enjoy a refreshing cocktail instead. We'll take the scenic route back to Provincetown and wrap up our tasting journey at The Canteen in the heart of Provincetown. Here, each guests can enjoy a scrumptious seafood sampler, including fresh oysters from the Provincetown Harbor, a taste of lobster salad, and their famous signature Frozé!
That's the end of our tour, but feel free to stick around and soak up the wonderful bayside atmosphere!

image.alt: The Local Tasting Tour - Provincetown & Truro!

item.title: Private Open- Air Pedicab Tour in Provincetown
item.description:
Discover Provincetown from a new perspective with our Private Open-Air Pedicab Tours. Relax in comfort as our knowledgeable guides lead you through the charming streets and scenic coastline of this historic town. Enjoy unobstructed views and personalized insights into local history, culture, and hidden gems that only a pedicab can offer. Whether you're captivated by the natural beauty or intrigued by Provincetown's rich heritage, our tours provide a unique and eco-friendly way to experience all that this vibrant destination has to offer.
Unlike large bus or group tours, pedicab tours provide an intimate experience with a knowledgeable driver who can tailor the time to your interests. You can ask questions, engage in conversations, and make specific requests. Pedicab tours can be customized to your preferences and schedule.
Choosing a pedicab tour contributes to sustainable tourism practices and minimizes your carbon footprint.

image.alt: Private Open- Air Pedicab Tour in Provincetown
